property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The object's container.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: justification
property.shortdesc: Paragraph justification.

property.name: firstLineIndent
property.shortdesc: First line left indent expressed in points.

property.name: leftIndent
property.shortdesc: Left indent of margin expressed in points.

property.name: rightIndent
property.shortdesc: Right indent of margin expressed in points.

property.name: spaceBefore
property.shortdesc: Spacing before paragraph in points.

property.name: spaceAfter
property.shortdesc: Spacing after paragraph in points.

property.name: hyphenation
property.shortdesc: Is hyphenation enabled for the paragraph?

property.name: minimumHyphenatedWordSize
property.shortdesc: Minimum hyphenated word size.

property.name: minimumBeforeHyphen
property.shortdesc: Minimum number of characters before a hyphen.

property.name: minimumAfterHyphen
property.shortdesc: Minimum number of characters after a hyphen.

property.name: maximumConsecutiveHyphens
property.shortdesc: Maximum number of consecutive hypenated lines.

property.name: hyphenationZone
property.shortdesc: Size of the hyphenation zone.

property.name: hyphenateCapitalizedWords
property.shortdesc: Is hyphenation enabled for the capitalized words?

property.name: hyphenationPreference
property.shortdesc: Hyphenation preference scale for better spacing (0) or fewer hyphens (1)

property.name: desiredWordSpacing
property.shortdesc: Desired word spacing expressed as a percentage.

property.name: maximumWordSpacing
property.shortdesc: Maximum word spacing expressed as a percentage.

property.name: minimumWordSpacing
property.shortdesc: Minimum word spacing expressed as a percentage.

property.name: desiredLetterSpacing
property.shortdesc: Desired letter spacing expressed as a percentage.

property.name: maximumLetterSpacing
property.shortdesc: Maximum letter spacing expressed as a percentage.

property.name: minimumLetterSpacing
property.shortdesc: Minimum letter spacing expressed as a percentage.

property.name: desiredGlyphScaling
property.shortdesc: Desired glyph scaling expressed as a percentage.

property.name: maximumGlyphScaling
property.shortdesc: Maximum glyph scaling expressed as a percentage.

property.name: minimumGlyphScaling
property.shortdesc: Minimum glyph scaling expressed as a percentage.

property.name: singleWordJustification
property.shortdesc: Single word justification.

property.name: autoLeadingAmount
property.shortdesc: Auto leading amount (in percentage)

property.name: leadingType
property.shortdesc: Auto leading type.

property.name: tabStops
property.shortdesc: Tab stop settings.

property.name: romanHanging
property.shortdesc: Is Roman hanging punctuation enabled?

property.name: bunriKinshi
property.shortdesc: Is BunriKinshi enabled?

property.name: burasagariType
property.shortdesc: The Burasagari type.

property.name: kinsokuOrder
property.shortdesc: The preferred Kinsoku order.

property.name: kurikaeshiMojiShori
property.shortdesc: Is KurikaeshiMojiShori enabled?

property.name: kinsoku
property.shortdesc: The Kinsoku Shori name.

property.name: mojikumi
property.shortdesc: The Mojikumi name.

property.name: everyLineComposer
property.shortdesc: Whether to enable every line composer (as opposed to single line composer)?
